default.Instructions:
📝 Quick Tips:

• 'Use Input' takes text from input node
• 'Use Prompt' uses text from prompt box (input node won't run)

• Prompt saves only if 'Save Name' is filled
• Saving to an existing name overwrites it

• Use 'List' dropdown to select prompt lists
• Manage lists with the Prompt Stash Manager node

• For real-time editing, use Prompt Stash Passthrough node with 'Pause to Edit'
• If workflow closes while paused, use 'Clear Paused' in Manager node

• Saved prompts persist between sessions
• All nodes share the same prompt library
default.ManageLists:
📂 Managing Prompt Lists:

• Use the Prompt Stash Manager node to add or delete prompt lists
• 'Add' creates a new list named in 'New List Name'
• 'Delete' removes the selected list from 'Existing Lists'
• Cannot delete the last remaining list
• 'Clear Paused' resets any stuck pause states

• Organize prompts into categories using lists
• Switch between lists in the Prompt Stash Saver node using the 'List' dropdown
default.negative_demo: worst quality, bad anatomy, text, error, jpeg artifacts, blurry

characters.wizard: elderly wizard with long white beard, wearing blue robes with stars
characters.warrior: strong warrior wearing plate armor, battle-scarred, determined expression
